meanings.definition: A store that sells paper goods and stationery.
meanings.sent1: I visited the papeterie to buy some new notebooks.
meanings.sent2: The papeterie on the corner has a wide selection of greeting cards.
meanings.sent3: The papeterie owner joked that they were running out of paper because of a paper-eating monster.
meanings.sent4: Her desk looked like a papeterie exploded with all the paper and pens scattered around.
meanings.sent5: The papeterie was a colorful wonderland of paper and pens.

meanings.definition: Writing materials such as paper, pens, and envelopes.
meanings.sent1: She carefully organized her papeterie on the desk.
meanings.sent2: The papeterie in her bag was always ready for writing notes.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the papeterie, causing a mess of paper and pens.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a papeterie of ideas waiting to be written down.
meanings.sent5: The papeterie smelled of fresh paper and ink.
